NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Consumption and column Import & Export is the flow between 3552 and 3804? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Retail Delivery to node Food Preparation and from node Import Inspection to node Seeding, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Transportation to node Consumption, from node Consumption to node Trade Agreements, and from node Consumption to node International Shipping, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node International Shipping to node Soil Preparation, from node Food Waste to node Import Inspection, and from node International Shipping to node Fertilization, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Retail Delivery to target node Fertilization? Please list all node labels along this path.
